main event: A civilian observed a pendulum-swinging object with colors ranging from blue to white to orange in Orwigsburg, PA.
interesting points: The object was stationary for about 1 hour,The observer described the object as small, roughly the size of a baseball,The object displayed swinging movements similar to a pendulum,The sighting duration was approximately one hour,This sighting was documented in a Project Blue Book report.
sighted object: a small round object swinging like a pendulum
